class.name: baxter_sim_controllers/BaxterPositionController
class.description: The BaxterPositionController tracks position commands for the entire Baxter arm. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: baxter_sim_controllers/BaxterVelocityController
class.description: The BaxterVelocityController tracks velocity commands for the entire Baxter arm. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: baxter_sim_controllers/BaxterEffortController
class.description: The BaxterEffortController tracks effort commands for the Baxter joints. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: baxter_sim_controllers/BaxterHeadController
class.description: The BaxterHeadController tracks position commands for the Baxter head. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: baxter_sim_controllers/BaxterGripperController
class.description: The BaxterGripperController tracks gripper commands for the Baxter end effector. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.
